title: Immersive Team-Based Practice Design for Nursing Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Simulation-based training program for in-service nurses to strengthen practical competencies.

learning_goals: Apply team-based communication strategies in simulation scenarios to resolve patient safety issues with 90% accuracy
Manage emergency situations with an 80% or higher success rate using critical thinking in an immersive simulation environment
Learners can improve their self-efficacy by 20% through a debriefing session after the simulation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
